name: Squishy Run
description:
It is Squishy Time!

2 game modes:
> Squish Me! Squish your favorite Squishy on the stage.
> Squish Adventure. Select your squishy and start your journey on Pet Island. 96 challenges to complete.

Collect coins and Squishy tokens as you progress through your adventure to unlock new challenges and get more squishes.

Each new game release will have additional Squishies to unlock.
